content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles at positions(-16.5, 19.5), (-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 21.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-15.5, 19.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0) which is currently not receiving any ingredients to smelt.
- Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0) which is currently smelting copper ore into iron plates.

### Research lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5) which is currently not in research progress.

### Assembling machine for automation science pack at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5) which is currently not receiving electricity and cannot create automation science pack due to missing resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required crafting machine or furnace available to craft items. In this case, copper plates cannot be crafted without a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. The error indicates that there was an attempt to insert copper ore into a furnace without having any copper ore in the inventory.

### Errors when using electricity
- Ensure that your electricity generation structures (like steam engines) are connected to a power network and have the necessary inputs (like water) to function properly. The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Errors with no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt. The furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0) has no ingredients to smelt, which is causing it to be inactive.
